rankings.name: Royal Flush
rankings.description: A, K, Q, J, 10, all the same suit

rankings.name: Straight Flush
rankings.description: Five cards in a sequence, all the same suit

rankings.name: Four of a Kind
rankings.description: Four cards of the same rank

rankings.name: Full House
rankings.description: Three of a kind with a pair

rankings.name: Flush
rankings.description: Five cards all the same suit, not in sequence

rankings.name: Straight
rankings.description: Five cards in sequence, not all the same suit

rankings.name: Three of a Kind
rankings.description: Three cards of the same rank

rankings.name: One Pair
rankings.description: Two cards of the same rank

rankings.name: High Card
rankings.description: When you haven't made any of the hands above
